productsTable: CREATE TABLE `utox`.`products` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `productId` VARCHAR(100) NULL, `productName` VARCHAR(250) NULL, `category` VARCHAR(50) NULL, `type` ENUM('FEATURED', 'RATED') NULL, `retailPrice` VARCHAR(100) NULL, `actualPrice` VARCHAR(100) NULL, `userReviewRate` INT NULL, `userReviews` JSON NULL, `createdAt` TIMESTAMP(3) NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3), `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP(3) NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3), PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) VISIBLE);
